faqs.How can I contact you?: You can reach us at info@moha.gov.lk or call +94 112 785 141. Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM.
faqs.What payment methods do you accept?: We accept online payment, bank transfer, and cash payments at the institute. Installment options are available for selected courses.
faqs.Will I get a certificate?: Yes! Upon successful completion, students will receive an official government-recognized certificate that is valid nationwide.
faqs.What are the class timings?: Courses are held on weekdays from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM and weekends from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Some courses may have flexible schedules.
faqs.Are scholarships available?: Yes! We offer merit-based scholarships for top performers and need-based financial assistance for eligible students. Early bird discounts are also available.
faqs.How can I get support?: Students can contact our support team via email at support@itdlhnegombo.gov.lk or call our office during business hours for assistance.
faqs.How do I apply for admission?: You can apply online through our website's Admissions page or visit our office in person. Contact our admin team for step-by-step guidance.
faqs.Do you offer online classes?: Currently, our courses are primarily on-campus to ensure hands-on practical learning. However, we may offer hybrid options for selected courses.
faqs.Can I visit the institute before enrolli: Absolutely! We welcome prospective students to visit our campus. Please call ahead to schedule a tour and meet with our counselors.
faqs.What is the refund policy?: Refunds are available within the first two weeks of course commencement, subject to a processing fee. Please contact administration for details.
faqs.Are there any prerequisites?: Most courses require basic computer knowledge or basic English proficiency. Specific eligibility criteria are mentioned for each course.
faqs.Can working professionals join?: Yes! Our evening and weekend classes are designed specifically for working professionals and students.
faqs.Is parking available?: Yes, we have parking facilities available for students and visitors.
faqs.Do you provide job placement assistance?: We provide career guidance and connect students with industry opportunities through our network of partners.
